entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this morning and early this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
